description.translate: From your cold glow, and your immutable silence, you did incarnated, incarnate and will incarnate immortal freedom.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Pensé de la lune\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§aDe ta froide lueur, et de ton immuable silence,\"}","{\"text\":\"§atu incarnas, incarnes et incarneras l'immortelle liberté.\"}","{\"text\":\"§aFrom your cold glow, and your immutable silence, you did\"}","{\"text\":\"§aincarnated, incarnate and will incarnate immortal freedom.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§a2 §7HUN§a1\"}"]}}
